Richard Olson, Councilor At Large, Position 1

Term Ends: May 2026 Email Richard Olson 832-595-3340

Richard Olson was first elected to Rosenberg City Council District 4 in 2018 and At Large, Position 1 in a runoff election on June 15, 2024.
